command.command: root\cimv2::select WorkingSet from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'sccservice%'
root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'sccservice%'

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: Sybase CPU利用率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: Sybase CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: Sybase CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
